alert.note: Alert for South Central Oregon Desert including the BLM Land in Eastern Lake and Western Harney Counties (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 09 at 2:49PM PDT until August 09 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR ABUNDANT LIGHTNING ON DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 625... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH HAS BEEN CANCELLED FOR STRONG GUSTY WIND WITH LOW RH AND ABUNDANT LIGHTNING ON DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 625... The National Weather Service in Medford has cancelled the Fire Weather Watch. * Impacts: lightning and very dry vegetation will likely result in new fire starts. Gusty thunderstorm winds could contribute to fire spread. Despite rainfall, initial attack resources could be overwhelmed and holdover fires are possible. * Affected area: In South Central OR...Fire Weather Zone 625. * Wind: South 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. Winds from thunderstorm outflows are likely to be erratic and 40+ mph. * Thunderstorms: Scattered thunderstorms will continue into this evening. Storms will also become wetter today (up to half an inch has been observed so far when multiple storms move over the same location) and have a marginal risk (5%) of severe strength hail or winds. * View the hazard area in detail at: https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD Precautionary/preparedness actions... Familiarize yourself with your evacuation plan. Where will you go? How will you get there? Who will you call to let others know your are safe? Visit ready.gov/wildfires for more information. A Red Flag Warning does not mean there is a fire. It means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. These conditions promote rapid spread of fire which may become life threatening. Evacuate if ordered to, or if a fire threatens. &&

area.areaDesc: South Central Oregon Desert including the BLM Land in Eastern Lake and Western Harney Counties
